arStrings.szText: {c_important}Ice Shards{/c} have a {c_number}[{SF_18}*100|%|]{/c} chance to ricochet to another enemy. {c_important}Ice Shards{/c} always ricochet off of {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemies.
Hitting an enemy with {c_number}{SF_16}{/c} {c_important}Ice Shards{/c} in a single cast makes them {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_17}{/c} seconds.
While you have a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c} active, {c_important}Ice Shards{/c} always receives its bonuses against {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemies.
